$SPY $MSFT $AAPL future just went green.. fuck the bears up tomorrow!!!

Headlines talk about the DOW dropping 300. But let’s be real. It fell 800 points after a remarkable start. 

Futures are crashing. World markets are crashing. Crypto is crashing.  Friday is going to be a complete mess. 

So while we are due for a broad based market rebound. Energy and materials remain the only place to be if you’re looking out several weeks.  Will share some ideas in the coming days. 

As for the general market. Here are some things to consider in the coming days. 
$IRDM $CZR $DKNG $pypl $aapl 

Tomorrow will be a day that folks reflect on their investment strategies. Hopefully young investors that have just entered the greatest bull market in history take note of learnings here. Based on a recent survey, majority of FOMO growth chasers are underwater by at least 30-50%. 

One thing to realize, a 50% drop requires a 100% recovery. It won’t happen this year. Smart money has exited and will continue to exit growth. This is fundamental. Not speculative.
